conbody.p: For existing users that have subscribed to at least one of Katalon products before September 21st, 2022, we offer the Katalon Platform Trial plan with an unlimited number of projects, users, and test results.

li.p: Your Trial plan will expire on February 15th, 2023.

conbody.p: To find out if you're eligible for the trial, log in to , then go to Settings > Subscription Management. If you're eligible for the trial, the Subscription Management page should display the trial option as below.
To start the trial, click on the Get started button.

The Katalon Platform Trial plan will expire on February 15th, 2023. When your trial period expires, you need to purchase a monthly or annual subscription. Otherwise, your plan is switched to the or plan.
When your trial period expires, you need to purchase a monthly or annually subscription. Otherwise, your plan is switched to the or plan.
